CustomField.description: The compound rating that comprises one rating per type of data scored by a match engine. For example, in AABZBAAAFBZ the "A"; in the 1st position means that the Name scored between 80-100 and the "A"; in the 2nd position means that the Street Number had to score exactly 100. For more details, please see the Identity Resolution guide.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The compound rating that comprises one rating per type of data scored by a match engine. For example, in AABZBAAAFBZ the "A"; in the 1st position means that the Name scored between 80-100 and the "A"; in the 2nd position means that the Street Number had to score exactly 100. For more details, please see the Identity Resolution guide.
CustomField.label: D&B Match Grade
